comment.author: 46512523@N06
comment._content:
Gourdou Leseurre is a real brand name
:=):=)

comment.author: 26881258@N07
comment._content:
Marked G.L.S. No.1, this aircraft was the first Gourdou-Leseurre 2. C1, distinguished from the C1 by its redesigned wing and greatly strengthened wing bracing. The tail unit has also been revised.

Source: J.M. Bruce. War planes of the first world war Volume Four Fighters p.123
